title: Grab Anker’s do-it-all Mac docking station stand with this rare $50 discount
content:
Macworld

Clean desks help with productivity, and this 12-in-1 Anker docking station and monitor stand will definitely help with both. And you’ll be happy to know that Prime members can get this versatile gadget for $200, a $50 discount from its MSRP.

Perhaps one of the coolest products Anker has made thus far, the Anker 675 is a docking station that doubles as a stand for your monitor or MacBook. The stand is full of a wide range of ports, including USB-C, USB-A, HDMI, Ethernet, a 100W upstream port to connect to your laptop, and more. There’s even a DC-in port, an audio jack, and an SD/micro-SD slot. Oh, and there’s also a wireless charging pad on the side of the stand for your iPhone.

It literally has everything you could need for an awesome daily experience. You’ll even be able to easily manage all the cables on the underside of the stand. This cool design allows you to store your keyboard and other peripherals underneath, or even your laptop, thus keeping a tidy workspace.

We reviewed the Anker 675 and gave it a 4/5 star rating, as well as our Editor’s Choice award, appreciating the stylish design, the speedy USB ports, and the HDMI 4K port on the stand’s underbelly. So, if you’re an Amazon Prime member, go ahead and place your order for the Anker 675 for $200. If not, Amazon offers a 30-day free trial you can start at any time.
